speaker: Sanjeev Jagtap
title: Amplify Your Content Insights Across AI by filtering with Content Moderator
description:
Amplify your content insights across vision, speech, and language by filtering out potentially illegal and inappropriate content with Content Moderator. Join Sanjeev Jagtap, PM for Cognitive Services, as he discusses top use cases for using AI to help moderate your apps.


For all the sessions: https://channel9.msdn.com/Events/Cognitive-Services/Cognitive-Services-Live
